Top Gear US - Season 04, Episode 03 
HDTV x264 - DHD Release 
September 18, 2013

RELEASE NOTES: KILLERS pre'd a 2GB monster with an average video bitrate in excess of 6000kb/s. The rules state as a general suggestion, average video bitrate in excess of 5000kb/s is a sign that a higher CRF value should be chosen, when possible. Top Gear being a competitive reality series qualifies for CRF 22.We also used a very mild softener and very slow preset for extra compression while still maintaining a quality picture. We hope the other folks take a lesson on this because let's be honest - 2GB for 44 minutes of video is ridiculous.
